name: Neon Overdrive
description:
This game was developed at gamescom 2017.

Use the left stick to move, A to shoot (long press shoots bigger)

 2 controllers are recommended

(alternatively you can control the characters with WASD and spacebar as well as arrow keys and right ctrl)

Programming and design by Ronja Böhringer

Models and animation by Viktor Weßling

Additional textures by Albina Hironymus
